aboutPage.title: S.N.A Al-Attal Engineering Industries
aboutPage.subtitle: A 30-year journey of excellence in filling line manufacturing

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: S.N.A Al-Attal Engineering Industries was founded in 1994 in the 10th of Ramadan City, Egypt. We started as a small workshop manufacturing spare parts for filling machines and evolved to become one of the largest companies specializing in liquid filling production lines in the region.
story.p2: In 2010, we opened our branch in Istanbul, Turkey, to be closer to our customers in Europe and the Middle East. Today, we proudly serve over 300 clients in 15 countries worldwide.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the first and best partner for every company seeking integrated and reliable filling solutions in the Middle East and Africa region.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Delivering innovative, high-quality filling solutions that meet our clients' needs while adhering to the highest quality and safety standards.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our daily work

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: We commit to the highest quality standards in everything we manufacture

team.desc: An integrated team working with a unified spirit

global.desc: We reach our customers wherever they are

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: We always strive to develop new and innovative solutions

productsPage.title: Complete Production Lines
productsPage.subtitle: Discover our wide range of filling machines and equipment

filling1.name: Automatic Filling Machine
filling1.desc: High-speed filling machine with advanced servo motor technology and touch screen

filling2.name: Semi-Automatic Filling Machine
filling2.desc: Easy-to-operate filling machine with advanced PLC system

capping1.name: Automatic Capping Machine
capping1.desc: Multi-head capping machine with high-precision automatic adjustment

labeling1.name: Automatic Labeling Machine
labeling1.desc: High-precision labeling machine with dual heads for accurate label placement

packaging1.name: Shrink Wrapper
packaging1.desc: Shrink wrapping machine with automatic film feeding and touch panel control

complete1.name: Complete Production Line
complete1.desc: Fully automated complete production line with customizable features and high efficiency

solutionsPage.title: Complete Solutions for Every Industry
solutionsPage.subtitle: We provide customized solutions to meet the needs of various industrial sectors

food.title: Food & Beverage Industry
food.desc: Complete filling solutions for the food and beverage sector with the highest hygiene standards
food.fullDesc: We provide integrated production lines for water, juices, dairy products, oils, and sauces with FDA-compliant systems and aseptic filling technology

pharma.title: Pharmaceutical Industry
pharma.desc: GMP-compliant filling solutions for the pharmaceutical sector with validation support
pharma.fullDesc: Specialized production lines for syrups, suspensions, IV solutions, and vaccines with sterile filling and track & trace systems

cosmetics.title: Cosmetics Industry
cosmetics.desc: Precision filling systems for cosmetic and personal care products
cosmetics.fullDesc: High-quality production lines for creams, lotions, perfumes, and shampoos with multi-product capability and decorative packaging options

chemicals.title: Chemical Industry
chemicals.desc: Corrosion-resistant filling solutions for chemical products with enhanced safety features
chemicals.fullDesc: Industrial production lines for detergents, lubricants, pesticides, and paints with hazmat handling and explosion-proof systems

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us
privacyPage.introduction: At S.N.A Al-Attal Engineering Industries, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our website and services.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you fill out a contact form, request a quote, or subscribe to our newsletter. This may include your name, email address, phone number, company name, and any other information you choose to provide.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect to respond to your inquiries, provide customer support, send you updates about our products and services, and improve our website and services. We may also use your information for marketing purposes with your consent.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business, subject to confidentiality agreements.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us analyze website traffic and remember your preferences. You can control cookie settings through your browser.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact our privacy team.

questions.title: Questions About Your Privacy?
questions.content: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please don't hesitate to contact us.

termsPage.title: Terms & Conditions
termsPage.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully
termsPage.introduction: Welcome to S.N.A Al-Attal Engineering Industries. By accessing and using our website and services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using our website and services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: S.N.A Al-Attal provides industrial machinery and equipment for liquid filling production lines. All product specifications, prices, and availability are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any product or service at any time.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of S.N.A Al-Attal Engineering Industries and is protected by international copyright laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our written permission.

limitations.title: Limitation of Liability
limitations.content: S.N.A Al-Attal shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use our services. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the specific product or service in question.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Arab Republic of Egypt. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Egypt.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the website. Your continued use of our services after any changes indicates your acceptance of the new terms.

questions.title: Questions About Terms?
questions.content: If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please contact our legal team.
